About.title: About the Ephraim Legacy
About.subtitle: Faith you can wear. Style that speaks.
About.missionText: Ephraim Legacy was born from the desire to express faith through something simple yet powerful: what we wear. Each design carries a message of hope, truth, and love, so that God's Word can be seen and remembered every day.
About.valuesFaith: Faith in Christ as the foundation of everything.
About.valuesExcellence: Excellence and purpose in every detail.
About.valuesPurpose: Taking the message of the Gospel beyond words.
